issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Starting sessions in parallel would improve the HS2 startup time.
fields.summary: don't start HS2 Tez sessions in a single thread

comments.body: [~gopalv] [~sseth] fyi
[~sseth] [~hagleitn] can you take a look? Note that this will start multiple tez apps in parallel (using different TezClient-s).

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12775203/HIVE-12528.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to no test(s) being added or modified.

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to 10 failed/errored test(s), 9861 tests executed
*Failed tests:*
{noformat}
TestHWISessionManager - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file

ATTACHMENT ID: 12775203 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
Not sure if MiniTez timeout is related, it could be. I will eventually test this on a cluster, and probably resubmit for HiveQA after review feedback.

What do you mean by correct visibility? The approach is the same - the sessions are taken from queue, the sessions are put back into queue. The only logic change is that it's done in parallel; all the threads are joined at the end in the same place. As long as there are no threading issues between different SessionState/TezClient objects, it should be ok.
Well patch fails with an NPE because SessionState is not attached on new threads. It's used in exactly one place so I think I will just remove its usage from TezSessionState init.

NPE where ?
Some of the variables being setup may not be visisble in the threads that make use of them. Making some of them final would be ideal.
The patch that works. This also changes how DagUtils waits for the files being localized in parallel to avoid huge unnecessary wait times for the threads of the same process.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12783476 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
Committed to master.

Doc note:  This adds *hive.server2.tez.sessions.init.threads* to HiveConf.java, so it will need to be documented in the Tez section of Configuration Properties for release 2.1.0.

* [Configuration Properties -- Tez | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-Tez]

Added a TODOC2.1 label.
